values:
My dear, what an indelible time it seems you are having. Aside from the arse wiping, I see no good reason why this place should be call-ed a resort. What kind of enticing brochures snared you? What late night infomercial? Alas, I'm sure it was the raving a dear one. Yes it must be, otherwise why bother going? There seems to be some serious bitchery going on in the convent. 

As I sit here clenching my anus in frustration for you, I realize that the only way for us to be happy forever without finding true love is to belong once and for all to each other. I daresay we should escape our doldrum life of resorting and vacationing with 'friends' to artistic ink parlors. You certainly wouldn't have to rip any openings in that unpleasant wound all women seem to have in common. Oh dear.

But seriously my lov-ed one, it has been too many days since you went to your quiet, enforced, very secure getaway. Where does life lead you upon graduating from that confounded abbey? Should I get into any of my schools and have the choice, we should voyage together, particularly New York or Chicargo. By voyage I mean find a cozy little 'partment. We must discuss this orally.

Ta,
Willy
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/14085.html

WIIIIIIIIIIILLLLLIAM. My adorned. I must say- the daisies and clover fields are much hard to see through these thick bars on my window. Ugh, how ghastly this resort is where I have been taken to- apparently upon the request of a "pal". William I must say- if ever you are given the opportunity as I was to "try on this jacket... come in this van... we are taking you to a resort" then daaaaling- do check up on it. Because not only are there NO bps for me to ask to shine my shoes and  make me a sandwich ( oddly enough however, there is always someone around to wipe my ass, even when i dont request it) -- but there is also NO carriage rides or spas. What kind of resort is this? Its as if... as if... I were living the life of a commoner. Ghastly William. Truly Ghastly. alas- i must be going now. i heard a bell just ring and i do suppose its now time for tea. or another enema. who is to say?


tata my love.


Marium
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/14018.html

i cant even handle the rumbling in my heart that occurred when i did but gaze upon your telegram. actually the rumbling resided only in my tummy. i am quite famished. why i must proclaim that it has been almost a full half an hour since Uretha and her child... well who can keep up with names when these brownies keep poping them out left and right. lets just  call her "ashy". anywho, it has been quite some time since U-dog and lil ashy have fed me breakfast in bed. or is it lunch, or dinner, or yet another snack. oh my, who can keep up with the time these days- especially now that i am bed ridden with morbid obesity. but i dont let the loose skin folds and heavy breathing try and tear me down. all 5 of my chins are beautiful. anyway waht im trying to say is you owe me a mouthful. kisses
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/13791.html

Last night I missed the man boy J Timbs in concert with Sir Timbaland. Or is it Sir Mixalot? Oh who cares, they are of the negro persuasion. I refused to go because when you've seen one Bob Fossey act, you've seen them all, wouldn't you say? I know I certainly don't want to be a dancing man, even while I can.
        On a more relevant note, I was pleasured to see you sent me another telegram! I began to fear your love for me had wilted like an erection revealed under a table in a science class seen by Jordan the pink Power Grainger. Kudos to you Usher Gay for putting up such a stiff fight in the grade of 8th.
         I have decided that nicknames are too confusing, and life too short, to be an effective means of carrying the vomit of word. Thus, I have decided to lay some names on the table right now. Actually, I'm going to do that in a more private letter, my scrumptious love, for fear of offending the jews or the blacks. Or any one not fortunate enough to have blonde hair and blue eyes or be named Michelle- foofoo, that means you are safe. Same to you Michelle Trachtenberg, you got to first Zion base safe. 
         My love, in a few minutes I have an examination in sightreading and playing in some fascinating little inverted chords for a jazz tune that is particularly wicked. I daresay I'm going to march up to the piano, wink at the professor, bang some notes out with my feet on the piano until the cacophony causes her to stop me and ask what the hell I'm doing, to which I will reply,"This is jazz ladies and gentleman," and just walk away, just walk away. I do love a good music joke.

       I do hope there isn't another half year in between these postings! I enjoy our banter oh so very, very much.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/13498.html

my adorned... i was twaddleing about and recalled this lil diddy of ours. how i have missed the incessant ramblings of our going ons about alcoholism, racism, slut-ism, and dead friends-ism. i miss "wigging" out with numerous partners- and i miss the social suicide we would commit with the savannah elite (who are... irrelevant anyway- lets just be real.. when has kissing thier asses ever gotten me a good cock ride?). i miss you my love. i miss "us". and i miss the overwhelmingly nature of "us". i jam out to heddy wigg in my horse and buggy constantly- and commence to use my hatchet wound as a food processor for the cucumber along side me. i cant handle the distance between us. i think i might have to smack a bitch up. how i do hope that we will be together beneath the stars and fake irish bastards on the prestigious st patts. ugh. i miss you.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/13251.html

Thy golden locks have been purged! Alas, and woe. Now you resemble a scientist, or perhaps a philosopher. Christmas is coming, the goose is getting fat, please put a penny in the old man's hat.

My dear, can you eat birds? I mean real birds, like a sparrow or perhaps finch, and not some dawdling lump of meat wandering around gibbering and gobbling for mercy before its head gets lopped off. Poor butterballs. A nice plump bluejay mayhaps?

Thank you very much for my birthday wishes lovelumps, it did make me feel rather special. Just think, five more years and you too shall be 18! But then, you shall be legal and I don't think I should enjoy sticking it in you as much. Something about loss of adventure. I wish I felt that way about spirits, but I continue to have visions of darkness from the night before when I awake from slumber at 2 in the ahftuhnoon. Oh the tales...I shall never know.

Did you know that I will be visiting my Savannahian relatives at their manor in slightly less than two weeks? By George, you'll be there too, shan't you? Gollygeewillickers Mary, another reunion. I daresay I might be the one with a mouthful this time, provided the red water isn't running. 

Well my dear, I shall call you soon. DO give me the time of day. 

Peace Niggah,
       WILLY IAMS
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/12867.html

eh hemm...

congradulatories on ur twentieth and first!!! now you can begin to do everything that u have been doing since u were a fetus in your mothers swollen womb. speaking of womb - mine seems a bit crowded lately. i dare say  that the b a n a n a peal(whew.. spelling that one was rahter rough- thank u for ur help Gwen S.)  we used as a contraceptive may not have been the best of tools. i fear that that ur spawn's swim team might have slipped past the potassium-walls and into my cave. alas- with all of the 8 am franzia stands ive yet to cease practicing-- this soon to b procaimed as "immacuylet" conception shall be missing half of his skull and jawbone. oh well- ill just keep him in the closet or soemthing. and hope that this one wont eat my shoes.

HAPPY BIRHTDAY MY BELOVED!!!!

i prey ur trophies ( stds) are quite enjoyable
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/12583.html

An itchy crotch again my beloved? Perhaps it is cookie crumbs from my side of the bed that cajoled their way into your nether the last time we made love. Which, I daresay, has been quite some length of time. As I recall, certainly not this past week, especially since the warts that plague me seem to be on the full crest of an outbreak.
But on a more serious note my dear, I seem to have found myself on the other side of your affections. I haven't caught a whiff from the Atlantic sea breeze of your crustaceous being! Not a day goes by that I don't wish I were with you, and as Princess Kelly would say, 'since you've been gone' I've been rather glum and well, plumsy. Or perhaps grapefruity. Take your pick of any large spherical objects and that is me. Except for watermelon because besides being more on the oval side of things, it is filled with fiber, and I have to say I am anything but regular, wot wot.
Mary, mary, oh so...contrary, I long to know when you will be back in your estate at the Tara manor. I shall arrive in precisely one month, or as some Canadians say, four weeks, or as some Estonians say, 27 days (and so on and so forth). 
I will send you a telegram before the sun sets my love. 

Impotently,
        Willy
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/12477.html

How my crotch doth long for thee. Well, it either longs, or itches... im not sure.



cheerio,

Mary Magdaline
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/12147.html

My dearest, homeliest Mary,

        Do you believe that through some glitch in the system that I have acquired a well documented phenomena known as telepathy? Yes, it is quite remarkable. It is a means by which I can decipher even the most autistic of personalities, and decide instantly that I dislike them. This may not change anything regarding my treatment of common folk before I attained this gift from afar, but it certainly makes my decisions clear as ice. Clear ice, that is.
        But that isn't nearly as important as the discovery of a crepe making place that is within walking distance of my new house. Whenever the carriage arrives that is indefinitely carrying you to my blue manor, we shall frolick in revelry. Not only is there a crepe place, but it is located immediately next to The Boot, a most remarkable place where drunken children stumble after midnight to make merry with more drinking, dancing, and shaking hands. The likes of Thinsey Blowhan has been seen "sniffing" around the establishment. 
         Oh dearest Mary, what joy shall we know in arms together? When our lips lock and our fingers touch? Heavens to Betsy.



                  Prestigiously,
                            William

Oh and congrats on this anniversary of your first breath outside of your mother's womb!
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/11933.html

My daaaaaling....

    Alas, yet another encounter has ocurred between myself and the one notorious songbird corus-line of HIV, yes i speak of the new-age rage, "LEASE" or something. after being subjected to the HIV-line once again, i waddled off into the depths of darkness that is my mind, to meditate on the "cinamatic revolution". Then, suddenly, some 'bitch' paaadon me for proclaiming truth dear william, but yes this little falacio interupted my pondering and asked, "ohhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh, how was it??? how was it???? ive been DYING to see it??????? oh but i heard its sad. is it sad?????"   to which i replyed to the fat and panting cum dumpster, " ugh... i guess its sad if u have aids or somthing. if not, its kinda funny."  and then i just walked away ladies and gentlemen, just walked away.  which reminds me, our dear friend 'wiggy" as we have come close enough to call him , has created a film far more superior to the likes of this broadway faggotry. those little whiners in "LEASE" dont know about troubles. i do say william, you dont know hardships till youve had your dong chopped off and turned into a sideways grimis on an eyeless face, and then had to prance around the U S of A to stalk the boy who stole ur heart, and ur songs... and who never loved the front of u. and... lease doesnt utlize the car wash. this masterpiece makes lease look like a 2 hr long whiney AA meeting and story shareing time. The whole world needs to get a little more "Hed" if you will. right O , right O. i love you my daaaling, through thick, and thin genitalia.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/11624.html

Oh Mary,
      How can this be? Mon amour, je suis triste. Pour quoi vous ne m'aimez pas plus? Je n'ai pas compris. Alors, je me sens vides. L'amour et un oiseau rebelle, et ne peux pas etre domestique.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/11474.html

Oh my dear! Inspiration at long last has still denied me the pleasure of creative impulse! I shall still post something, because I tire of my own patience with the muses. 
On this prestigious Day of Tues, I write to declare my freedom from boundaries. These include the boundaries of mcfattiness, v-cardness, and my ubermanliness. all of these things are illusions, and I will no longer bow down to these silly glitches in our social timeline. Just think my dear, how long had the world turned before these ridiculous morays appearred, hmm? Thousands of years! And to think, every religion thinks that it is the only one, every culture thinks it is the only one, and every hamburger tastes delicious. And how many different forms of these proposed items have there been, are there now, and will be in the future? Hundreds! Thousands! Nay, dozens! My dear, we need to liberate our chained minds and genitals and release ourselves upon the world with renewed vigor, because I am already the zero and two and come May so shall ye be too! I don't care anymore, so I can now say that beaners annoy the hell out of me! BP's do too! Whiggers as well, and not the ones we share! Indians, well, they don't card, so they're ok. But I dislike so much, and I'm not afraid to say it anymore because I could be shot by a BP on Christmas eve and ruin my family's holidays forever! Yes I say! I shall be free! And freedom begins by unzipping my fat suit and leaping to the sky pronouncing myself as Christian, and yes pun intended! I like exclamation points!



Oh Mary, I wish I could infuse you with me, and me with you. Why don't you want to study abroad with me? No matter, I shall be flying solo, and flying FREE!
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/11032.html

alas, after many passing moons i have finally sat down and collected my thoughts which to share with you my lovely. but what to say?? so much has come to pass since my last confession of a teenage drama queen that i am finding my mind cluttered and swarming with so much to say, that i am but lost among harsh whispers that echo within these empty walls of my mind. what??? whats that you cry whispers???? you are not in my mind??? good golly!!!! you cry out from the love below???!?!?!?  or should i say... not so loved below.  oh my darlings...no wonder your crys are harsh and solomn. how neglected you must feel looking up late into the night and seeing no love come your way- because it gets trapped in mouth. alas, my saliva slutting days shall come to an end. Tonsil hockey is what i have come to understand, highly overrated. yet, this labrinth so knightly named procreation is completely beyond my comprehension. oh william.... trim down my hedges and gide me through this nasty maze, so that i may understand the ways of the world, or at least, the ways of my little sister, and the wiggers in her closet. 


"muuuuaahhhh girl!!!! call me!!!"
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/10882.html

william! this friday past it was made so undeniably evident that i am, alas, in the words of the bang-bandit j-j a "prozi". and one that has well surpassed the tribulations of one miss poopsy. speaking of poo- what a night of cock-blockery! i waited all night with duct tape and roofie pills for chris to arrive. well fine.. perhaps it wasnt exactly aaalll night- it was more like 5 and a half minutes - because thats how long it took for me to get liver-soaked. yes. it apears that my tolerance is about as high as my areolas are small. thats a joke that you and countless others can enjoy...or nausiate over.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/10465.html

And so it ends, this era of seeming frivolity. I am one score of years, entering my third decade as a person who lives vicariously through himself. The yoke of mortality grows heavier, and it seems that one's own anniversary is not so much a celebration as it is an acknowledgement of imminent maturity. Whimsy and melancholy seem impossibly intertwined as the acceptance of adulthood seeps in. What a feeling of relief and nasty rejection that fills me! 
Time fools me, yet I cannot fool time. Tis unfortunate, since I consider myself to be obnoxiously mischevious. My love, I need you more and more as time fools me- perhaps together we can fool time.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/10163.html

Dearest Willaim-

   This day only comes once a year- and it is hightly noted by the smells of candle wax, sugar, and wraping paper. yes. today is undoubtably one of those great days of the year -- it is a national holiday deemed "Bondage-Sex in the Candy Store". yes it a glorious day celebrated by all- mostly families and small children. it is a day where everyone is wrapped in paper- burned with candle wax on thier genitailia - and get to consume massive amounts of sugar in one big clustourous affair. yes indeed it is an american holiday- simply because what draws so many to it is the alure of sweets. I belive this is why you and I are true americans. yes of course we will always vist paris, rome, and cabo san lucus on numerous occations and undoubtably enjoy ourselves- but thats only because we know that we can always arrive at these locations with suitcases half empty- and return with truck loads of cheap labor. ahh.. God Bless America - and our bad-ass mentality. oh, and happy birthday.



I love you with all of my being, and whats left of my liver.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/9971.html

When I am one and twenty my darling, we shall throw a party the likes of which have never been seen, even by Mr. Diddy. I shall begin recruiting A-listers for the party come this Giving of Thanks, with Chrissy. It's a shame he's only in a million and two movies, won some award or something or other, and still has no fame, because if he were, photographers and paparazzi would flock to the club of yachts. I should have liked to pull a Paris whilst you pull a Tara. Then we can tell the journalists we are rich and slutty and shall become famous for no other reason at all. In fact, we will become celebrities in the blink of an eye, faster than you can catch the hiv in a backstage men's bathroom on Broadway.

My love, I apologize for this short teaser of an entry, but you know what they say. Things to eat, and people to do. Hmm, I think that might well be backwards- yes, exchange infinitives.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/9703.html

oh my william! indeed! finally the posting of our love is decorated to match the very sophistication of our everyday actions and lives. speaking of sophistication- i am but overwhealmed with excitement and exuberance about the upcoming ball of poopsy and who. oh my willy- can you even concieve of the prestigious guest list?? only the finest shall attnend. all of the greatest love ya girls from the SCD and S who have been pawing at the poo for the invitation to glammor and an open bar will be passing her by at the reciving line where poops is destined to be drapped in white- simulating a virginal bride to be. baugh haugh haugh haugh. oh. i mean.. pardon me... its just... it is rather hard to imagine lady poops in a reciving line where she isnt bent over with a welcome sign on her back. alas- it shall be interesting to say the least. oh and Chrissy the celeb is likely to attend the event as well! well it appears that you and i will be hording him like a pizza the whole night- seeing as how we are the only people who can relate to the pressures of celebrity status and the daunting of tabloids and paparattzi. raaaally william- non of the other common folk that will be muffing around could ever find something of substance to talk to him about- so it is our mere duty as celebs to protect the kind fellow. so... ill bring the rope- u bring the duct tape- and we will toss him in a dark room and get all we can out of him.... even if it takes a wig or two. but indeed william- it seems to be a promising event. with all the guest of poopsy and who. wait- who will be on that guest list??? oh who cares. shes only hott by association. 

ta ta... girl, i love you.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/9294.html

Great Scott Mary! You seem to have singlehandedly psychoanalyzed the enormous flesh-eating vulva that is the scroll of countenances!. Bravo I say. Bravo.

As to the task at hand, however, we are still unclear. Our reunion is nigh, if not imminent. The consummation of our love and the portent of our doom has been revealed to me, by a very reliable source. My mid-midday snack whispered into my ear today that should we not dress for the occasion that is the Feast of all Saints, then we shall never reunite. However, I feel that anywhere there is a feast, there I shall find myself as well.
I was pondering which getup I should deck myself with as I cruised the marketplace today. I went into the magic crafts shop known as Spencerians and was dismayed to find they were fresh of of Tinkerbells. Pity, I wanted so much to rub myself down with some good cheese and don myself 'Stinkerbell.'
My dear, do contact me. My All Hallows' Eve ideas have faltered away almost as quickly as my erections.

Post Scriptum- Oh! My dear! I almost forgot. Have a very merry friendship week.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/9118.html

I was PURUSING yet again in place of being homely work and i grazed past a few findings that made me queeze. i never knew how many different ways that one could display thier eh hem superior computer skills and lack of a social life by creating brillant replicas of falics- just to have the world copy and paste it into oblivion. its also precious to get hit with trucks, recive wall-length quotes and stories, noting newly invented holidays like "friendship week" and alas-- perversly being asked for a stick of gum. 

what a lovely world we live in, full of brilliant technological advancements that enable all of us to post a good "love ya girl" electronically. 

holler home slice. oh haugh haugh haugh- i am rather... with it.. wouldnt you say?
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/8935.html

I remembered that fair song as soon as I had read your journal. A heap of images and thoughts churned through my noodles whilst I took a stroll through O. B. City. Although dropping the 'st' from stroll in the previous sentence would be far more accurate. Enjoy my philosophy.
           While we are on the subject, I must broach the question of why seven gnarly little child molesters covered in grime and dark soot from the mine don't pound away on the fair flaxen secret folds of some silly little Snow White. Perhaps if she was Snow Black they would have thought she worked in the mines as well and found her fuckable.
         Oh, and Sleeping Beauty. Obviously, my dear, she has a most severe case of mono. Maleficent was simply trying to stop the confounded plague by spreading by putting those thorns around her castle. Of course, leave it to flamin' fairies to try and spread the plague. Quite successful they were in that endeavour...although a tad bit more severe than mono.
         Don't even get me started on Pocahontas. Although, perhaps she got more out of beads than we ever did with a whole continent. Who's to say. 
         Prince Charming? More like Prince Farming, rooting out any dirty little kitchen wench with a similar foot fetish as he, as if she were a radish and then taking part in her spoils.
         Jasmine mustn't get it in her head that she's a princess forever. Once those desert nomads find oil and turbans, her little power trip will be put to rest shortly. That is, six feet under along with any other intelligent sand rat that lived out there.
         And lastly in my social commentary, I shall suffice it to say that Belle single-handedly began the sexual-deviant group known as the Furries. 
                                                                      I love you my little warmonger,
                                                                             well I AM
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/8655.html

why willard....i do say... i did but feel the majasty of the mountains pour over me. then i realized- it was probably just ur fluids that had splashed upon my face. eh hem. oh well alas. none the less- i must give thanks to sir Kanga for making me feel uplifted like the crane that lifts me out of my chair to get the door for the pizza man. i am a little... "obby" you know. 

Heres to you Kanga- you look lovely when you paint with all the colors of the wind.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/8085.html

SUA you say? My dear, I seem to recall a classic example of someone who suffers from this most severely. He and I attended the same acadamy, although I could only but catch glimpses of him dashing through the quad lest he be later than ten minutes early to class. The entire name somewhat escapes me at the moment, but I remember the remarkable resemblence he bore to our ever-conquering hero, Harry Potter. In name only, mind you. The REAL Harry Potter would think nothing of casting glittery spells on willing orifices, hole in sheet or not. As I recollect, you visited me one day at the monastery and attempted to make contact with this queer creature, but he ran away, flailing his floppy lunchbox at you and shouting yiddish this and hebrew that. The gall! As a Philistine, I should expect a bit more violence in my direction, say a rock slingshotted at me or perhaps a tornado of fire, but a soft lunchpack with naught but kosher hollah wafers? At least they started the whole trend of circumcision; I daresay the few glimpses I caught of my Euro-trash friends' 'bishops in turtlenecks'(hedwig, I confess) gave me quite the shivers- of disgust, that is. Can you imagine me having to make intimacy with a Q-Tip everynight? Ye gods, I'd rather have a narkie from someone of the classical city of Troy. Which indeed may have happened....the Q-Tips, that is.....wot?  All women should be offended by him, calling the gentler sex an unclean personage! Something about bleeding every now and then, preposterous idea indeed. I think he suffers from a most severe case of SUA, otherwise known as BUA. Broomstick Up Ass syndrome. Quite unfortunate. I wish poor Consuelo were here to grant this Hairy throwback a gift of the modern age, the hiv. 

Why can't the world be more like us, my love? More pure and free. There would be war, but in between the sheets and not between countries. I.N.T.E.L.L.I.G.E.N.C.E. has alerted me to stay hidden tonight; fortunately, our dear friend mr asia vomit will be here. Here's to you dear,
                                                          Williammmm
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/7803.html

Why my love, as i was waxing my chest and PURUSING our love letters i seemed to come across a note from someone seeming to be suffering from SUA syndrome. or as you may find it called in latin-medical terms Stick Up Ass syndrome. it is a rather fatal disease suffered by many of those who we tend to encounter. symptoms do involve making obnoxious faces of confusion and disgust after a comment that one of us have made and they waddle away and we hope they trip. most advanced stages of the disease cause the victims to yelp..."wait... did u just say that?' while squinching up thier faces in a most repulsive mannor that causes one to punch them in thier cock-gulping throats- thus adding to the fatality of SUA. so my love...when people wonder as to why we act in the way we do- harassing the patients of SUA- we stand proud and claim- oh do fuck off- it may apear im fingering his asshole....but im simply trying to remove the stick within it.



i do love you,     girl.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/7660.html

well that was... pleasent. i hope u very much enjoyed getting that off ur chest. too bad removing the hair from it isnt as simple for u.



ta ta



love ya girl.
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/7344.html

Today as I was reminising and perusing and misspelling, I thought of my days of yore at this convent refinery. It seems I have bored myself with tales of my creepy crawly nethur-regions and Medusa-like surrowndings, and thus lended to the suiside of my creative impulses. Al of ths rectal humping and sphincter smashing has scared al the ripe white worms which crawl inside me and dun damage which lends itself to my creatuv impulss! Bollux! Bolderdash! Why indeed! Aren't I clever fortrying to sound intelligent with myinterjections of british colloqullisms! black peopel! HAHAaa wot wto. oh can you sunerstand wat i am saing? m neethur! hmm snort snrot cupkaes anyone? my thighs resemble fats of cottage cheese! the congreation is anay rapin me! horizontal mombo!!!!!!!

lest anyone forget, this is why we write our own love scripts!
http://williamandmary.livejournal.com/6965.html

Oh but dearest Miriam, I couldn't agree more! Science shmience is exactly the kind of local colloquialism I would use in this instance. The only Newton I have faith in is the kind filled with fig preserves. Mayhaps we  should begin a movement to end this silly nonsense, and outfit ourselves with white sheets and white hats. We could purify ignorance.
          I read in the color papers today that there was a special entitled 'endless shrimp' at the quaint eatery called Lobster donned in Red, or something to that degree. It excited my pallate, and I think I shall join the locals in this feeding frenzy ce soir. I grow anxious for this even as I write. Shrimp which are endless? Someone hand me a towel, I do believe I just salivated upon myself.
